title: JSON schema for CodeSync settings file

___importSnippets.description: If CodeSync should auto import/export snippets

___externalPath.description: The path to where CodeSync should export

___autoImport.description: If CodeSync should auto import things when VSCode launches

___importKeybindings.description: If CodeSync should auto import/export keybindings

___importSettings.description: If CodeSync should auto import/export settings

___importExtensions.description: If CodeSync should auto import/export extensions

___autoExport.description: If CodeSync should auto export things when VSCode exists
